name: kong-automation
description: Kong service and route automation using Cypress

scripts.test: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:wait && cypress run && npm run docker:down
scripts.report:clean: if exist mochawesome-report\*.json del /q mochawesome-report\*.json && if exist mochawesome-report\mochawesome-report rmdir /s /q mochawesome-report\mochawesome-report
scripts.test:mochawesome: npm run report:clean && npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:wait && cypress run --reporter mochawesome && npm run docker:down
scripts.report:generate: npm run mochawesome:merge && npm run mochawesome:generate && npm run mochawesome:open
